title: AMD introduces new Radeon RX 6950 XT and two other GPUs, plus games with FSR 2.0
content:
AMD is adding three new GPUs to the Radeon RX 6000 lineup, including the Radeon RX 6950 XT, the most powerful graphics card in the series. For more mid-range gaming, there’s also the Radeon RX 6750 XT and 6650 XT. In addition to the new GPUs, the company also announced the first games that will

The post AMD introduces new Radeon RX 6950 XT and two other GPUs, plus games with FSR 2.0 appeared first on XDA.
description: AMD has announced three new GPUs, including the range-topping Radeon RX 6950 XT, as well as the first games to support the FSR 2.0 tech.
